snippet: The United States will soon appoint an ambassador to Somalia for the first time since closing its embassy in Mogadishu 23 years ago.
abstract: United States is poised to appoint an ambassador to Somalia for the first time since closing its embassy in Mogadishu in 1991.
lead_paragraph: The United States will soon appoint an ambassador to Somalia for the first time since closing its embassy in Mogadishu 23 years ago.
